statements: SELECT * FROM FarmManagement;
SELECT id, field_id, schedule_time, water_usage FROM FarmManagement WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, field_id FROM FarmManagement ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage FROM FarmManagement GROUP BY field_id;
SELECT MAX(schedule_time) AS latest_schedule_time FROM FarmManagement;
SELECT id, field_id, schedule_time, water_usage FROM FarmManagement WHERE id = 1;
SELECT field_id, schedule_time, water_usage, id FROM FarmManagement WHERE schedule_time > '2021-08-01' ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM FarmManagement WHERE water_usage BETWEEN 100.0 AND 200.0 ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT id, field_id FROM FarmManagement WHERE schedule_time < '2021-07-01' AND water_usage > 150.0;
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage FROM FarmManagement;
SELECT * FROM Farm;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM Farm;
SELECT * FROM Irrigation WHERE amount_used > 100;
SELECT farm_name, irrigation_date FROM Farm, Irrigation WHERE Farm.farm_id = Irrigation.farm_id;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM Farm WHERE farm_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Farm WHERE farm_location='California';
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM Farm ORDER BY farm_name DESC;
SELECT farm_id, COUNT(irrigation_id) AS irrigation_count FROM Irrigation GROUP BY farm_id HAVING COUNT(irrigation_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Farm JOIN Irrigation ON Farm.farm_id = Irrigation.farm_id WHERE Irrigation.amount_used > 100;
SELECT farm_name, MAX(amount_used) AS max_amount_used FROM Farm JOIN Irrigation ON Farm.farm_id = Irrigation.farm_id GROUP BY farm_name HAVING MAX(amount_used) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule;
SELECT id, date, duration FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT amount FROM water_usage WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT id, name FROM farm_fields ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, crop_type FROM farm_fields WHERE area > 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE date = '2022-10-21';
SELECT id, time, duration FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE duration > '02:00:00';
SELECT name, area FROM farm_fields WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE amount BETWEEN 100.00 AND 200.00 AND sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT id, date FROM water_usage WHERE date >= '2022-09-01' AND date <= '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM Farm;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM Farm WHERE farm_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Field WHERE area > 100;
SELECT field_name, area FROM Field WHERE field_id = '98765432-abcdef-fe98-7654-3210fedcba98';
SELECT start_time, end_time, water_usage FROM IrrigationSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM Farm WHERE farm_id = '66ec503c-3077-4acb-a28d-27b27cf22bb6';
SELECT field_name, area FROM Field WHERE farm_id = '66ec503c-3077-4acb-a28d-27b27cf22bb6' ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT field_name, water_amount FROM Field JOIN WaterUsageLog ON Field.field_id = WaterUsageLog.field_id WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY water_amount DESC;

SELECT Farm.farm_name, WaterUsageLog.water_amount FROM Farm JOIN Field ON Farm.farm_id = Field.farm_id JOIN WaterUsageLog ON Field.field_id = WaterUsageLog.field_id WHERE WaterUsageLog.water_amount > 100 ORDER BY WaterUsageLog.water_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm
SELECT name, location FROM farm ORDER BY established_date DESC
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE farm_id = 1
SELECT crop_id, name, type FROM crop WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT farm.name, crop.name, crop_planting.planting_date FROM farm INNER JOIN crop_planting ON farm.id = crop_planting.farm_id
SELECT * FROM farm WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT name, location FROM farm ORDER BY established_date DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_farms, location FROM farm GROUP BY location HAVING total_farms > 1;
SELECT farm.name, crop.name FROM farm INNER JOIN crop_planting ON farm.id = crop_planting.farm_id INNER JOIN crop ON crop_planting.crop_id = crop.crop_id WHERE crop_planting.quantity > 100;
SELECT farm.name, SUM(water_usage.amount_used) AS total_water_used FROM farm LEFT JOIN water_usage ON farm.id = water_usage.farm_id GROUP BY farm.name ORDER BY total_water_used DESC;
